opponent.label: Darkness
opponent.from: KonoSuba: God's Blessing on this Wonderful World!
opponent.artist: UnderscorM3 (Body), Hologic (Face), MyMainAccIsANord (Model, Posing), CorkyTheCactus (Model Tweaks), RinkahBestGirl (Posing), Richar (Posing)
opponent.description: Darkness is a Crusader from a noble family. She is a massive masochist with extremely perverse fantasies that she gets carried away with. She is a member of Kazuma's party.
